titles.title: A bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 321 Montgomery Road in Altamonte Springs, Florida, as the "Arthur Stacey Mastrapa Post Office Building".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

action.text: Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.

calendar.text: Ordered placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 146.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 4/22/2005--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 321 Montgomery Road in Altamonte Springs, Florida, as the "Arthur Stacey Mastrapa Post Office Building."
